title: Let's try this again... 1907 Ty Cobb rookie SOLD
author: Bicem

posts.post_title: Let's try this again... 1907 Ty Cobb rookie SOLD
posts.post_content:
My other sold too quick, so I'll make one more available... same price SOLD

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/bicem/playerphotos/1907%20Dietsche%20Cobb%20front.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/bicem/playerphotos/1907%20Dietsche%20Cobb%20back.jpg[/IMG]

Guaranteed to grade numerically by PSA or SGC.

One of the hobby's hottest cards as collectors are realizing how under-priced they have been for a long time.  Reminiscent of the rise of the Ruth and Lou rookies.
That’s a nice Dietsche Cobb!  I love how these cards have taken off in the last couple of years.
I'm interested in purchasing. PM sent.
